properties.name: promptAgainForEachNewVersion
properties.description: Show dialog again when application version will be updated. Defaults to `true`

properties.name: usesUntilPrompt
properties.description: count of runs of application before dialog will be displayed. Defaults to `3`

properties.name: openStoreInApp
properties.description: leave app or no when application page opened in app store (now supported only for iOS). Defaults to `false`

properties.name: useCustomRateDialog
properties.description: use custom view for rate dialog. Defaults to `false`
